Package csc1035.project2

Class Timetabling

java.lang.Object
csc1035.project2.Timetabling
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITimetabling
public class Timetabling
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITimetabling
This is a special class for representing the Timetabling object. This has methods relating to the attributes and some of its behaviour

    • ShowBookedRoomDetail

      public void ShowBookedRoomDetail​(java.lang.Double RoomNumber)
      This method is after calling the method createtimetable forperson V2 (), an optional method. If the user chooses to view the room details, this method will be triggered, otherwise it will not be called
